Reviews.Title: “Excellent, friendly hotel.”

Reviews.Content: wife booked 4 nights 40th birthday surprise feel welcome arrived staff friendly helpful spacious terrace exceptionally clean tastefully decorated bathroom spotless assortment complimentary sundries didnt breakfast hotel found couple blocks suited catalonia nice location walking distance buses metro nearby tired walking

Reviews.Title: “Amazing night”

Reviews.Content: spent night hotel fun barcelona location 10 minutes passeig de gracia confortable modern clean breakfast included delicious staff pleasant helpful especially manager highly recommend ps love elevator

Reviews.Title: “over priced for what it has to offer”
Reviews.Author: Orbiter007
Reviews.Content: worst time trade fair sold situated inside road roger de lluria bit walk nearest metro price charged euro 300 night tax tiny spartan teacoffee maker ironboard available charged extra safe internet etc restaurant hotel food options limited tad expensive 2 odd blocks pg de gracia shopping short distance catalunya choice stay isnt bad book avail rate worth staying

Reviews.Title: “A very comfortable hotel”

Reviews.Content: comfortable hotel moment stepped door welcome front desk warm foyer pleasant size comfortable clean bar pleasant restaurant staff pleasant helpful dinner expensive particular people front desk willing help enquiries organised taxi day departure location eixample convenient metro pleasant walk la rambla

Reviews.Title: “Good location but smallish room”
Reviews.Author: DavidLau
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights conclusion guided tour spain september 2010 main benefit location eixample district 2 blocks passeig de gracia highend shopping streets barcelona gaudi designed buildings boot hotels tour beds desk sitting luggage floor wood paneling walls look little lowrent dents dings walls pay 5 euros day safe free fast wifi bathroom marble green colored wood trim bathroom little stinky bathroom decentsized unlike bedroom frontdesk person efficient

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic and safe location in a brilliant hotel.”
Reviews.Author: NLjuanito
Reviews.Content: hotel catalonia located close paseo de gracia casa batlló casa 10 minutes walk plaça de catalunya close shops famous la rambla locations easily barcelona city tour bus metro station nearby hotel hotel safe contrast la rambla stayed previous occasion hotel lobby spacious reception staff friendly helpful feel welcome speak english willing indicate locations tourist attractions shops restaurants provided free barcelona map spacious comfort clean superb bath fresh towels minibar free wifi available buffet breakfast superb ample plenty fresh fruits breads hot cold choices overall definitely stay due perfect location kindness staff cleanness

Reviews.Title: “Great location, Great service, Great experience”
Reviews.Author: g_bz2000
Reviews.Content: hotel located 5 minutes de catalunya approximately 10 minutes rambles blv reception staff friendly helpfully especially hotel manager taking care morning till evening modern hotel clean buffet breakfast rich plenty verity cheeses bread cold cut fruits breakfast staffs friendly highly recommend definitely return
